Text: Cargill at Peoples Cc Lpst PatriceGeoff How do you guys want to handle the contract with this customer Will he stay on ENA paper or do we EES send him a new contract I need these answers today because the customer will be moved an EES pool today for June I would also like to see the contract you guys have with them so I can understand what obligations I would owe them Thanks Jesus
Cargill ContractLpst Patrice Have you had a chance to locate the Cargill contract We need to get together to discuss how our desk can help you on a day to day basis since we are now EWS
ANRLA Paper BidKevin Please provide your bid for the volumes located in the attached file I will call you around pm today Thanks Jesus
ANRLA Paper BidKevin Please provide your bid for the volumes located in the attached file I will call you around pm today Thanks Jesus

ANRLA Paper BidKevin We are done at NX minus EES sells ANRLA paper to ENA for the monthly volumes attached on the ANRLAxls file attached down below Thanks Jesus Forwarded by Jesus GuerraHOUEES on AM Enron Energy Services From Jesus Guerra AM Phone No To Kevin nronXGate cc Subject ANRLA Paper Bid Kevin Please provide your bid for the volumes located in the attached file I will call you around pm today Thanks Jesus

Cargill at Peoples Cc PatriceGeoff How do you guys want to handle the contract with this customer Will he stay on ENA paper or do we EES send him a new contract I need these answers today because the customer will be moved an EES pool today for June I would also like to see the contract you guys have with them so I can understand what obligations I would owe them Thanks Jesus

Basis TradeGeoff I agree to sell you the attached Mich Con basis position at and I agree to buy the attached ANRML basis position at Please callemail me to confirm or if you would like to change anything Thanks Jesus
Basis QuoteGeoff Please provide your bid for the LONG Mich Con basis position along with your offer for the SHORT ANRML basis position I will call you tomorrow after lunch to discuss Thanks Jesus

ANRML Paper OfferGeoff EES buys ANRML paper at NX plus for the monthly volumes listed down below Thanks Jesus Forwarded by Jesus GuerraHOUEES on AM Enron Energy Services From Jesus Guerra AM Phone No To Geoff nronXGate cc Subject ANRML Paper Offer Geoff Please provide your offer for ML paper for the months and volumes listed below Jul month Aug month Sep month Oct month Nov month Dec month Jan month Feb month Mar month Apr month May month Jun month I will call you around pm today to finish the transaction Thanks Jesus

RE NGIChicago Paper Offer RequestDONE Thanks for the timely response Jesus From Geoff nronXgate on AM To Jesus ES cc Subject RE NGIChicago Paper Offer Request NX Original Message From Guerra Jesus Sent Thursday May AM To Storey Geoff Subject NGIChicago Paper Offer Request Geoff Please provide your offer for the attached NGIChicago paper volumes File NGICHI basis position xls Thanks Jesus
NGIChicago Paper Offer RequestGeoff Please provide your offer for the attached NGIChicago paper volumes Thanks Jesus
is a position on the web for your group If I send you my resume will you give it to your boss

ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS Involved in trading of energy specifically power Identify and evaluate current power market needs supply availability and new market opportunities Ability to perform shiftwork ampm or pmam Excellent phone skills Strong desire to learn trading ESSENTIAL REQUIREMENTS Advanced Excel spreadsheet skills Bachlors degree preferably in a financial or economic discipline Trading experience is a plus Knowledge of Risk Management tools Knowledge of trading products regional forward price curves risk management pricing strategies power supply and ransmissionphysical assets to executefacilitate transactions Knowledge of regions in which power is traded SERC ECAR PJM MAIN NY Power Pool PREFERRED SKILLS NA SPECIAL CHARACTERISTICS NA CONTACT To be considered for this position please email your RESUME to Plain text in the message body or an attached Worddoc are acceptable No columns italics or underlines If unable to email mail to JPalmer EBI Enron Corp Smith Street Houston TX You MUST mention the REQUISITION in the subject line of your email or if mailing your resume NO PHONE CALLS OR PERSONAL VISITS TO RECRUITER OR HIRING MANAGER All resumes will be kept strictly confidential Enron is an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer and subscribes to a drugfree and smokefree workplace
PositionHeres my resume Please provide a copy to your boss and with a good recommendation Thanks Jesus
